```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>")

library(smcepi)
```

This function calculates the standard deviation of a proportion.

## Data structure

This data includes a numerator and denominator to plug in to the function.

```{r}
  data <- data.frame(
    num = 50,
  denom = 2000)
```

## Application of the function

To use the function, supply the numerator followed by the denominator to the `prop_sd` function.

```{r}
prop_sd(data$num, data$denom)
```
